txt.en: 'Our fishes now, yesss, precious!'
'Where did fishes come from? We don't knows, precious, no, we doesn't! *gollum*'
'You rot-bag! My lads didn't spring the Sneak from the Elf-warriors for nothing!'
'Mustn't ask questions, or might be last fishes we eats, precious!'
'I've got orders to keep the Sneak safe. He's got something he's supposed to be doing, see?'
'Won't Udulug be sorry? No more laughing at us, no! *gollum* *gollum*'
'But that's the last you'll hear of it!'
'Keep your eyes peeled. The creature might be anywhere.'
'Remain vigilant!'
'This is always the least exciting part of a hunt, [placeholder].'
'Ho there, Garbert!'
'When hunting the white hart, I lay in wait for nearly....'
'I am back, friends! We will stop this creature, you will see!'
'I thought I heard something.'
Talk to Adwold
Talk to Garbert
'I'll be inside, my frying-pan at the ready!'
Talk to Adwold
Talk to Adwold

'We are going to trap this creature, [placeholder], I can feel it! It will surely come back to the cottage tonight, and we will be waiting!\n\n'I have already made most of the preparations. We only await Adwold!'

'It is a shame that you lost him, but you do not have the experience in tracking that I do, so that is to be expected. You did your best, [placeholder], and I appreciate it.

'I think we gave that creature enough of a fright that he will not be troubling Garbert or Afanen or their child again, and is that not what matters, after all?

'Good work with the Orc, by the by! If it was not for my leg, I would have helped you out with him, of a certainty! I wonder why this Udulug was out here, and what his connexion to our creature might have been? Very strange. Probably it was nothing important.'
'This will be a perfect place to lie in wait, [placeholder]. Keep your eyes open, for the creature will be back sometime tonight, or so Garbert believes!'
'Flee! We must flee, precious!'

'There's something out there, [placeholder]...I think our creature is nearby!

'There it is again: a soft splashing! He is coming from the water!

'I will give you the signal to jump out and try to grab him -- we want him to be in the middle of eating the fish, so wait for my signal before revealing yourself!'
'Are you ready to go?'
Defeated Udulug
'Ach! Sss -- enemies, enemiesss!'
You and Garbert are prepared to set in motion the fisherman's plan to catch the sneaking creature that haunts Tâl Bruinen.
'Udulug! Filthy Orc is no help at all! *gollum*'
'Sméagol hates them!'
'We'll shows them, precious, yesss, we will!'
'Do not let him get away!'
'Here fishes, here fishes!'
'We'll find Udulug! *gollum*'
'Poor Sméagol so hungry! *gollum*'
'Udulug kills nassty [placeholder]!'
'Ouch! My leg! Keep going, [placeholder], I will catch up to you!'
'Where is it, preciousss, where is it?'
'We will put the fish by the side of the house. This way, [placeholder].'
Chase the sneaking creature through Tâl Bruinen
Defeat Udulug
'Ssss! Go away! Leave us alone!*gollum*'
Wait for Adwold to arrive
Place fish beneath the window
Keep watch for the creature
Wait for Adwold's signal
'Not safe, nowhere safe!*gollum* *gollum*'
Grab the creature at Adwold's signal
'Cruel [placeholder] hatesss us, wants to hurts us!'
Chase the sneaking creature through Tâl Bruinen
'We doesn't want fishes, keep nassty fishes!'
Chase the sneaking creature through Tâl Bruinen
Chase the sneaking creature through Tâl Bruinen
Chase the sneaking creature through Tâl Bruinen
'Climb tree? No, no, not tall enough! *gollum*'
'If we had our birthday present, nassty [placeholder] would be sorry, yesss!'
'I hope so, Adwold.'
'[placeholder]! It looks like I arrived just in time!'
'Nassty wicked [placeholder]! We hates it!'
'What happened to the creature? You lost him?'
'I hope the creature is distracted by those fish. There are not very many.'
Garbert has already prepared some of the trap, but he still needs your help.
'Ah! There he is!'
'You place the fish beneath the window there.'
Adwold is waiting for you to place the fish beneath the window.\n\nAdwold has shown you the perfect place to leave the bait for your trap: beneath the large window on the side of Garbert's cottage.
'That should do.'
Adwold is preparing to lie in wait for the creature to appear.\n\nYou and Adwold must steel yourselves for the springing of the trap.
'Not yet, [placeholder]! Wait for my signal!'
'Now, [placeholder]! Get him!'
'It appears Garbert set up a place where we can keep watch. Follow me.'
Adwold is hiding behind the makeshift cover Garbert constructed by his cottage.\n\nWhat was that sound? Adwold is certain he heard something -- could it be the creature?
'Paddle, paddle, paddle, precious!'
'If the creature does ignore the fish, I suppose we could try making a lot of noise.'

The sneaking creature has come again to Garbert's cottage, and you and Adwold are ready to spring the trap.\n\nAdwold has told you to wait for his signal before jumping out at the creature and trying to seize it.
'You really could not find more fish than this?'
The sneaking creature is escaping through Tâl Bruinen, and you must follow it if you can.
'Ah, it does not matter.'
The sneaking creature is escaping through Tâl Bruinen, and you must follow it if you can.
'I am sure Garbert and Afanen's son will be fine if this does not work.'
The sneaking creature is escaping through Tâl Bruinen, and you must follow it if you can.
The sneaking creature is escaping through Tâl Bruinen, and you must follow it if you can.
'Won't go back to Udulug! We won't, my preciousss!'
The sneaking creature is escaping through Tâl Bruinen, and you must follow it if you can.
'Fishesss? Why are there fishes, precious?'
You have lost the creature, but encountered an Orc that seems to have been charged with tracking its movements: this is Udulug, of whom the creature spoke.\n\nUdulug must be defeated.
Adwold has managed to catch up to you despite suffering a leg injury during the chase.\n\nAdwold is waiting to hear the results of the chase.
Instance: A Trap for the Creature
'What was that?'
